Plot: After being double-crossed and left for dead, a mysterious man named Walker single-mindedly tries to retrieve the rather inconsequential sum of money that was stolen from him.
Title: Point Blank
Writer: Alexander Jacobs (screenplay), David Newhouse (screenplay), Rafe Newhouse (screenplay), Donald E. Westlake (novel)
Actors: Lee Marvin, Angie Dickinson, Keenan Wynn, Carroll O'Connor
